articles.title: ECD Automotive Design Showcases the Modern Potential of Classic Series Vehicles with Project Inizio
articles.mainIdea: ECD Automotive Design Showcases the Modern Potential of Classic Series Vehicles with Project Inizio
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: ECD Automotive Design Showcases the Modern Potential of Classic Series Vehicles with Project Inizio. KISSIMMEE, Fl., Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Automotive Design, the world’s largest Land Rover and Jaguar restoration company known for its bespoke Defenders, Range Rovers, Jaguar E-Types, Ford Mustangs, and Toyota FJs, introduces Project Inizio, an example of how classic Series vehicles can be transformed for today’s drivers while honoring the spirit that made them icons.
